name: Baked Chicken Parmesan
method:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 400Â°F. 
Step 2: Coat chicken breasts in breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. 
Step 3: Bake chicken in marinara sauce for 25-30 minutes.

name: Beef Stir Fry
method:
Step 1: Slice beef and vegetables. 
Step 2: Stir fry beef in a hot pan. 
Step 3: Add vegetables, soy sauce, and ginger. 
Step 4: Cook until vegetables are tender.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
method:
Step 1: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 
Step 2: In a separate pan, cook bacon until crispy. 
Step 3: Beat eggs and cheese together. 
Step 4: Toss hot spaghetti with egg mixture and bacon.

name: Vegetarian Chili
method:
Step 1: Saute onions and bell peppers in a large pot. 
Step 2: Add beans, tomatoes, and spices. 
Step 3: Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
method:
Step 1: Preheat grill to medium heat. 
Step 2: Grill salmon fillets for 4-5 minutes per side. 
Step 3: In a saucepan, melt butter and lemon juice. 
Step 4: Pour sauce over grilled salmon and sprinkle with dill.
